name: Orion Culbertson
about:
Hey! I'm Orion  I'm a senior at San Francisco State University. I love art, dogs, hikes, programming, and lots of other things. 
I love German Shepherds, but all dogs are good dogs.
I am the Front End Lead for this project, and my goals are to get comfy in this area as well as learn a lot about the other parts of the project.

name: Miguel Galvan
about:
Hey ya'll! Excited to combine two things that interest me: dogs and machine learning!
I'm a senior at SFSU with knowledge of Java, C++, Python, MATLAB, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML.
My favorite dogs are beagles, they have the best barks!

name: Grayson Dew
about: My name is Grayson Dew, a senior at SFSU. I transferred from Leeward Community College after serving 6 years in the Navy as a linguist. I have experience in C++, C#, C, Java, and some Javascript, and I'm currently learning Python, Swift, and Typescript. After graduation, I plan to explore various career opportunities. I also enjoy participating in escape rooms.

name: Rigo Perez
about: I'm a senior at SFSU pursuing a BS in CS. Before that, I completed a certificate in The Humanities and an Associate Degree for Transfer in CS at Foothill College. My studies have included Operating Systems, Computer Architecture, Web Development, and Embedded Systems. I have programming experience in C, C++, Java, and JavaScript, and I'm currently learning Python and TypeScript.

name: Kristopher Phillips
about: Hi! I'm Kris P, a computer science student at SFSU. I love dogs and machine learning. My favorite breed is the West Highland Terrier. I have experience with C++, Java, and JavaScript. Currently, I'm studying machine learning using Python. I hope this site will be a fun and educational tool for everyone!
